entries.do_not_edit: The English version of this file (imperial_defensive_supply_terminal.stf) is automatically generated by the SwgConversationEditor.
entries.s_227: Your identity has been associated with a known Rebel collaborator. Please discontinue any use of this terminal and report to the nearest imperial representative for arrest.
entries.s_229: You have been recognized as a legitimate Imperial operative. Please select the type of activity you are interested in.
entries.s_231: I'm looking to help in building up the local defenses.
entries.s_233: We currently have four tasks available: Barricade Construction, Reinforcement Point Construction, Tower Construction or Turret Construction .
entries.s_237: Barricade Construction is work especially suited for a Structure Trader. However any Trader will be able to help.
entries.s_243: No, I think I'll look for something else
entries.s_247: Reinforcement Point Construction is work especially suited for a Domestic Trader. However any Trader will be able to help.
entries.s_249: Yes. I'll help construct reinforcement points
entries.s_253: No, I think I'll look for something else
entries.s_257: Tower Construction is work especially suited for an Engineering Trader. However any Trader will be able to help.
entries.s_263: No, I think I'll look for something else
entries.s_267: Turret Construction is work especially suited for a Munitions Trader. However any Trader will be able to help.
entries.s_273: No, I think I'll look for something else
entries.s_277: Very well. Thank you for supporting your local Imperial forces.
entries.s_285: Select component to scan for a level %DI security flaw.
entries.s_289: You have located an exploitable security flaw in level %DI's Data Pipeline
entries.s_291: Proceed to the next security level
entries.s_295: You found no security flaws in the level %DI's Data Pipeline. Returning to level 1.
entries.s_299: You have located an exploitable security flaw in level %DI's Instruction Handler
entries.s_301: Proceed to the next security level
entries.s_305: You found no security flaws in the level %DI's Instruction Handler. Returning to level 1.
entries.s_309: You have located an exploitable security flaw in level %DI's Operations Core
entries.s_311: Proceed to the next security level
entries.s_315: You found no security flaws in the level %DI's Operations Core. Returning to level 1.
entries.s_317: I'm looking to help out in the fighting
entries.s_319: Best of luck. The Empire appreciates your commitment to law and order. However this terminal has no combat related tasks available at this time.
entries.s_321: <In God Mode> Increase the slicing level
entries.s_323: This option will result in the terminal granting the optional item in addition to setting / increasing the bonus value on the optional item
entries.s_329: This option will reset the 'charges' value on the terminal to 0
entries.s_333: Your identity has not been registered as an active Imperial Operative. Please proceed to the nearest recruitment center to join the Imperial Forces.
entries.s_37: Accessing defensive supply terminal. Please note that access to this terminal is restricted to Imperial personal only.
entries.s_69: Disconnect and start slicing the terminal.
entries.s_71: You have successfully scanned all ten security levels. You now have to disconnect from the terminal and slice the components.
entries.s_72: Disconnect and start slicing the terminal.
entries.s_74: The security has been reset. Please disconnect from this terminal.
entries.s_89: Please give me some material enhancers.
entries.s_93: Material enhancers can only be dispenced once every 60 seconds. Please return later.
